definition: in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Deng Tong is Han Wendi is male bestow favor on, article emperor dotes on to him extremely.
sentences.chinese: 鄧通是漢文帝的男寵，文帝對他寵愛得無以復加。

sentences.english: And I thought your family could sink no lower.
sentences.chinese: 我想你們家是墮落得無以復加了。

sentences.english: The bathroom, too, could not have been more austerely furnished.
sentences.chinese: 衛浴設備更是簡單得無以復加。

sentences.english: It was no duplicity in order to increase rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 真是口是心非得無以復加。

sentences.english: And this moment, who is incapable of further increase youth waiting for you?
sentences.chinese: 而這一刻，是誰用無以復加的青春年華等待你？
